AvailabilitySet.description:
Specifies information about the availability set that the virtual machine should be assigned to. Virtual machines specified in the same availability set are allocated to different nodes to maximize availability. For more information about availability sets, see [Manage the availability of virtual machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-manage-availability?toc=%2fazure%2fvirtual-machines%2fwindows%2ftoc.json).

For more information on Azure planned maintenance, see [Planned maintenance for virtual machines in Azure](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-windows-planned-maintenance?toc=%2fazure%2fvirtual-machines%2fwindows%2ftoc.json)

Currently, a VM can only be added to availability set at creation time. An existing VM cannot be added to an availability set.

AvailabilitySetUpdate.description: Specifies information about the availability set that the virtual machine should be assigned to. Only tags may be updated.

AvailabilitySetProperties.description: The instance view of a resource.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of AvailabilitySets. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of AvailabilitySets.

AvailabilitySetListResult.description: The List Availability Set operation response.

zones.description: Availability Zone to use for this host group. Only single zone is supported. The zone can be assigned only during creation. If not provided, the group supports all zones in the region. If provided, enforces each host in the group to be in the same zone.

DedicatedHostGroupUpdate.description: Specifies information about the dedicated host group that the dedicated host should be assigned to. Only tags may be updated.

platformFaultDomainCount.description: Number of fault domains that the host group can span.

supportAutomaticPlacement.description:
Specifies whether virtual machines or virtual machine scale sets can be placed automatically on the dedicated host group. Automatic placement means resources are allocated on dedicated hosts, that are chosen by Azure, under the dedicated host group. The value is defaulted to 'true' when not provided.

Minimum api-version: 2020-06-01.

DedicatedHost.description: Specifies information about the Dedicated host.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of dedicated hosts. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of dedicated hosts.

DedicatedHostGroupListResult.description: The list dedicated host operation response.

DedicatedHostGroup.description: Specifies information about the Dedicated host.

DedicatedHostUpdate.description: Specifies information about the dedicated host. Only tags, autoReplaceOnFailure and licenseType may be updated.

platformFaultDomain.description: Fault domain of the dedicated host within a dedicated host group.

autoReplaceOnFailure.description: Specifies whether the dedicated host should be replaced automatically in case of a failure. The value is defaulted to 'true' when not provided.

hostId.description:
A unique id generated and assigned to the dedicated host by the platform.

Does not change throughout the lifetime of the host.

provisioningTime.description: The date when the host was first provisioned.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of dedicated hosts. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of dedicated hosts.

DedicatedHostListResult.description: The list dedicated host operation response.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

tags.description: Tag dictionary. Tags can be added, removed, and updated.

Workspace.description: An object that represents a machine learning workspace.

properties.description: The properties of the machine learning workspace.

location.description: Specifies the location of the resource.

tags.description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

WorkspaceProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning workspace.

workspaceId.description: The immutable id associated with this workspace.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This name in mutable

keyVault.description: ARM id of the key vault associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

applicationInsights.description: ARM id of the application insights associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

containerRegistry.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

storageAccount.description: ARM id of the storage account associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

discoveryUrl.description: Url for the discovery service to identify regional endpoints for machine learning experimentation services

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of workspace resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

hbiWorkspace.description: The flag to signal HBI data in the workspace and reduce diagnostic data collected by the service

serviceProvisionedResourceGroup.description: The name of the managed resource group created by workspace RP in customer subscription if the workspace is CMK workspace

privateLinkCount.description: Count of private connections in the workspace

imageBuildCompute.description: The compute name for image build

allowPublicAccessWhenBehindVnet.description: The flag to indicate whether to allow public access when behind VNet.

primaryUserAssignedIdentity.description: The user assigned identity resource id that represents the workspace identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with this workspace.

WorkspaceUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning workspace.

tags.description: The resource tags for the machine learning workspace.

value.description: The list of virtual machine scale sets VMs.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of Virtual Machine Scale Set VMs. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of VMSS VMs

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMListResult.description: The List Virtual Machine Scale Set VMs operation response.

zones.description: The virtual machine scale set zones. NOTE: Availability zones can only be set when you create the scale set

VirtualMachineScaleSet.description: Describes a Virtual Machine Scale Set.

value.description: The list of virtual machine scale sets.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of Virtual Machine Scale Sets. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of VMSS.

VirtualMachineScaleSetListResult.description: The List Virtual Machine operation response.

sku.description: The virtual machine scale set sku.

VirtualMachineScaleSetUpdate.description: Describes a Virtual Machine Scale Set.

tier.description:
Specifies the tier of virtual machines in a scale set.

Possible Values:

**Standard**

**Basic**

capacity.description: Specifies the number of virtual machines in the scale set.

Sku.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set sku. NOTE: If the new VM SKU is not supported on the hardware the scale set is currently on, you need to deallocate the VMs in the scale set before you modify the SKU name.

instanceIds.description: The virtual machine scale set instance ids. Omitting the virtual machine scale set instance ids will result in the operation being performed on all virtual machines in the virtual machine scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMInstanceIDs.description: Specifies a list of virtual machine instance IDs from the VM scale set.

instanceIds.description: The virtual machine scale set instance ids.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVMInstanceRequired.description: Specifies a list of virtual machine instance IDs from the VM scale set.

virtualMachine.description: The instance view status summary for the virtual machine scale set.

VirtualMachineScaleSetInstanceView.description: The instance view of a virtual machine scale set.

instanceId.description: remove some properties to simplify; The virtual machine instance ID.

VirtualMachineScaleSetVM.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set virtual machine.

stringLocation.description: This location should be a string

objectLocation.description: This location should be an AzureLocation
